items.question: I already use Raycast or Alfred. Why do I need Galpi?
items.answer: Raycast launches 'tools', Galpi opens 'work'. Raycast opens your PDF viewer; Galpi opens Page 14, 3rd Paragraph of that PDF. Use Raycast for apps, use Galpi for context. They are the perfect duo.

items.question: No subscription? How do you stay sustainable?
items.answer: We built a zero-server-cost architecture. Galpi processes all data locally on your Mac. Since we don't have monthly cloud bills, a one-time purchase is sustainable for us and better for you.

items.question: What happens if I stop using Galpi? Is my data trapped?
items.answer: Never. Your data is 100% yours. Galpi uses transparent text files (JSONL) instead of opaque databases. You can open them in any text editor and move your data whenever you want.

items.question: What if I move or rename my files?
items.answer: Galpi tracks them automatically. We don't just store file paths. By using macOS Inode and xattr tracking, we find your files even if they've moved to a different folder.

items.question: What if it doesn't fit my workflow?
items.answer: Try it for 7 days. If it doesn't click, we'll give you a 100% refund, no questions asked. We want Galpi to be a tool you love, not a purchase you regret.
